title: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
So Apparently I got punished by leaverbuster although I wasn't afk in my game. I had to quit to reconnect due to an issue, so it may have triggered on that. I think that is just pathetic since I didn't really afk.
- And it is 5 20 min queues wtf rito

replies.body:
It's not possible to receive a 5-game low-priority queue penalty for a single match. It actually takes a trend of disconnections to rack up enough attention from the system to get this penalty.

If you're experiencing specific technical issues that cause you to disconnect from matches, please let me know so we can work together to resolve it. Let me know if you have any questions.

Well, Yes, Due to a bug that I have since fixed I was leaving many matches, but just this game triggered an even higher penalty (20 mins). 

- This is mainly due to a bug that would force me to repair my client before joining a game. Though I HAVE fixed it It made me rack up major penalties due to it being unpredictable
